title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.1 - Conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.1 - Conditions

State Regulations

The racing secretary shall write the conditions of all
races and publish them sufficiently in advance of closing time of entries to
allow them to be read by all owners and trainers. He shall conduct the drawing
of all races and immediately post an overnight listing of the horses in each
race. He shall keep the preferred list of all horses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4223.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
